Class Beamer

java.lang.Object
Item
Beamer
public class Beamer extends Item
Class Beamer - Represents a teleportation device in the game. It can be charged with a specific room and later fired to teleport the player back to the charged room. A beamer can be recharged after use. The Beamer class extends the Item class to integrate with the game's item system.
Author:
Florian NELCHA

      Constructs a new unloaded Beamer with all the attributes of its super class, .

      pD - The description of the Beamer.

  • Method Details

    • charge

      public void charge(Room pR)
      Charges the beamer with the given room.
      Parameters:
      pR - The room to charge the beamer with.

    • fire

      public Room fire()
      Fires the beamer, returning the charged room.
      Returns:
      The room the beamer is charged with, or null if not charged.

    • isCharged

      public boolean isCharged()
      Checks if the beamer is charged.
      Returns:
      True if charged, false otherwise.
